metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Speed Week June 19-23, our week-long series of new product announcements and events dedicated to enhancing the developer experience to fuel productivity! View Updates and Announcements here

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Speed Week 2023 | June 19-23
relatedBlades.copy: Speed Week 2023 is a week-long series of new product announcements and events, from June 19 to 23, that are dedicated to demonstrating the performance and speed related impact of our products and how they enhance customer experience.

imageAssetFile.title: Speed Week 23 Hero Illustration

features.title: Welcome to Speed Week 2023
features.description: Cloudflare is proving we are the fastest at what we do. And we are making it as easy as possible for our users to attain those numbers.

imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Speed Week

features.title: Smart Hints make code-free performance simple
features.description: We're excited to announce we're making Early Hints and Fetch Priorities automatic using the power of Cloudflare's network.

imageAssetFile.title: Smart Hints

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of Cloudflare's Early Hints

features.title: How Cloudflare runs machine learning inference in microseconds
features.description: How we optimized bot management's machine learning model execution.

imageAssetFile.title: Catching bots just got faster: Faster ML inference at the edge

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a malicious bot in crosshairs

features.title: Every request, every microsecond: scalable machine learning at Cloudflare
features.description: In this post, we will guide you through the advancements we've made in our machine learning capabilities. We'll describe the technical strategies that have enabled us to expand the number of machine learning features and models, all while substantially reducing the processing time for each HTTP request on our network.

imageAssetFile.title: Every Request, Every Microsecond: Scalable Machine Learning at Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a digital brain

features.title: How Orpheus automatically routes around bad Internet weather
features.description: Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet for everyone, and Orpheus plays an important role in realizing this mission everyday. A little over one year ago, Cloudflare made Orpheus available to all customers for free. Since then, Orpheus has saved Internet requests that would have otherwise failed and made our customer's origins more reachable to everyone on the Internet.

imageAssetFile.altText: How Orpheus automatically routes around bad Internet weather

contentfulAsset.description: How Orpheus automatically routes around bad Internet weather

features.title: Cloudflare's global network grows to 300 cities and ever closer to end users with connections to 12,000 networks
features.description: We are pleased to announce that Cloudflare is now connected to over 12,000 Internet networks in over 300 cities around the world

imageAssetFile.title: 12000 interconnects

features.title: Introducing Low-Latency HLS Support for Cloudflare Stream
features.description: Broadcast live to websites and applications with less than 10 second latency with Low-Latency HTTP Live Streaming (LL-HLS), now in beta with Cloudflare Stream.

imageAssetFile.altText: Low-Latency HLS Support for Cloudflare Stream
imageAssetFile.title: Low-Latency HLS Support for Cloudflare Stream

features.title: Faster website, more customers: Cloudflare Observatory can help your business grow.
features.description: Today, we are thrilled to unveil the Cloudflare Observatory, our new and enhanced Speed Tab. Cloudflare customers now have access to a suite of powerful tools that simplify performance monitoring and offer enhanced product recommendations.

imageAssetFile.title: Faster website, more customers: Cloudflare Observatory can help your business grow.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of an observatory

features.title: How to use Cloudflare Observatory for performance experiments
features.description: Introducing Cloudflare's Performance Experiments in Observatory: Safely test code, improve website speed, and minimize risk.

imageAssetFile.title: Performance experiments with Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a fast mobile device

features.title: Argo Smart Routing for UDP: speeding up gaming, real-time communications and more
features.description: Today, Cloudflare is super excited to announce that we're bringing traffic acceleration to customer's UDP traffic. Now, you can improve the latency of UDP-based applications like video games, voice calls, and video meetings by up to 17%.

imageAssetFile.title: Turbo charge gaming and live video streaming with Argo for UDP

contentfulAsset.description: Argo illustration

features.title: Introducing HTTP/3 Prioritization
features.description: Today, Cloudflare is very excited to announce full support for HTTP/3 Extensible Priorities, a new standard that speeds the loading of webpages by up to 37%.

imageAssetFile.title: Introducing HTTP/3 Prioritization

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of web pages using HTTP/3

features.title: Introducing Timing Insights: new performance metrics via our GraphQL API
features.description: If you care about the performance of your website or APIs, it's critical to understand why things are slow.  Today we're introducing new analytics tools to help you understand what is contributing to "Time to First Byte" (TTFB) of Cloudflare and your origin.

imageAssetFile.title: Timings Insight

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a magnifying glass inspecting a stopwatch

features.title: Are you measuring what matters? A fresh look at Time To First Byte
features.description: Time To First Byte (TTFB) is not a good way to measure your websites performance. In this blog we'll cover what TTFB is a good indicator of, what it's not great for, and what you should be using instead.

imageAssetFile.title: Stop caring about TTFB

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a webpage and a stopwatch

features.title: INP. Get ready for the new Core Web Vital
features.description: On May 10, 2023, Google announced that INP will replace FID in the Core Web Vitals in March 2024. The Core Web Vitals play a role in the Google Search algorithm. So website owners who care about Search Engine Optimization (SEO) should prepare for the change. Otherwise their search ranking might suffer.

imageAssetFile.title: The future of performance

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a stopwatch measuring Core Web Vitals

features.title: Spotlight on Zero Trust: We're fastest and here's the proof
features.description: Cloudflare is the fastest Secure Web Gateway in 42% of testing scenarios, the most of any provider. Cloudflare is 46% faster than Zscaler, 56% faster than Netskope, and 10% faster than Palo Alto for ZTNA, and 64% faster than Zscaler for RBI scenarios.

imageAssetFile.altText: Faster and we can prove it
imageAssetFile.title: Faster and we can prove it

features.title: It's never been easier to migrate thanks to Cloudflare's new Migration Hub
features.description: Today, we are thrilled to relaunch Turpentine, and introduce Cloudflare's new Migration Hub. The Migration Hub serves as a one-stop-shop for all migration needs, featuring brand-new migration guides that bring transparency and simplicity to the process.

imageAssetFile.title: Turpentine 2.0

features.title: Part 2: Rethinking cache purge with a new architecture
features.description: In this post we'll be talking about some of the architecture improvements we've made so far for Cache Purge and what we're working on now.

imageAssetFile.title: Coreless Purge Architecture

features.title: Cloudflare Snippets is now available in alpha
features.description: Cloudflare Snippets are available in alpha. Snippets are a simple way of executing a small piece of Javascript on select HTTP requests, using the ruleset engine filtering logic.

imageAssetFile.title: Snippets

features.title: Workers KV is faster than ever with a new architecture
features.description: With the new architecture powering Workers KV our service will become faster and more scalable than ever. We have significantly reduced cold read probability, and enabled KV to serve over a trillion requests a month.

imageAssetFile.title: KV: New architecture, faster than ever

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of Cloudflare Workers KV

features.title: How Kinsta used Workers and Workers KV to improve cache hit rates by 56%
features.description: Kinsta delivers tailored cloud hosting solutions to over 26,000 companies across 128 countries. Learn how they used Workers and Workers KV to improve cache performance and customer performance.

imageAssetFile.title: How Kinsta used Workers and Workers KV to improve cache hit rates by 56%

contentfulAsset.description: Kinsta logo

features.title: Understanding end user-connectivity and performance with Digital Experience Monitoring. Now available in beta
features.description: Cloudflare announces the beta release of Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX), a Zero Trust offering designed to improve IT and network teams' visibility into end-user connectivity and performance issues. DEX allows administrators to monitor their WARP Deployment and create predefined application tests. Features include live team & device analytics, server and traceroute tests, Synthetic Application Monitoring, and Fleet Status for real-time insights on WARP deployment. This tool aims to streamline issue resolution and enhance organizational productivity.

imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust Digital Experience Monitoring

features.title: Donning a MASQUE: building a new protocol into Cloudflare WARP
features.description: We're announcing MASQUE support for our WARP iOS consumer app – with a brand new look and feel

imageAssetFile.altText: Support for Masque in Warp and ZT products
imageAssetFile.title: Support for Masque  in Warp and ZT products

features.title: How we think about Zero Trust Performance
features.description: In this blog, we're going to talk about why end-to-end performance is the most important thing to look at, why other methods like proxy latency and decrypted latency SLAs are insufficient for performance evaluations, and how you can measure your Zero Trust performance like we do.

imageAssetFile.altText: Zero Trust How we think about ZT performance
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust How we think about ZT performance

features.title: Descale your network with Cloudflare's enhanced Descaler Program
features.description: At its core, the Descaler Program helps derisk change. It's designed to be simple and straightforward, with resources to ensure a smooth transition and supporting technology to ensure the migration achieves your organization's goals.

imageAssetFile.altText: InDescaler follow up - Simple, no hassle migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One
imageAssetFile.title: InDescaler follow up - Simple, no hassle migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One

features.title: Globally distributed AI and a Constellation update
features.description: During this year's Developer Week, we announced Constellation, a set of APIs that allow everyone to run fast, low-latency inference tasks using pre-trained machine learning models, directly on Cloudflare's network.

imageAssetFile.title: Running AI Inference, on the cutting edge

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a lava lamp

features.title: Speeding up your (WordPress) website is a few clicks away
features.description: In this co-authored blog with Google's Patrick Meenan we will explain where the opportunities exist to improve website performance, how to check if a specific site can improve performance, and provide a small JavaScript snippet which can be used with Cloudflare Workers to do this optimization for you.

imageAssetFile.title: Speeding up your (WordPress) website is a few clicks away

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a rocket ship

features.title: Network performance update: Speed Week 2023
features.description: In this post we are going to share the most recent updates, and tell you about our tools and processes that we use to monitor and improve our network performance.

imageAssetFile.title: Network performance update: Speed Week

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of network performance

features.title: Benchmarking dashboard performance
features.description: The Cloudflare dashboard is a single page application that houses all of the UI for our wide portfolio of existing products, as well as the new features we're releasing every day.

imageAssetFile.title: Benchmarking dashboard performance

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a stopwatch measuring dashboard performance

features.title: A step-by-step guide to transferring domains to Cloudflare
features.description: Transferring your domains to a new registrar isn't something you do every day, and getting any step of the process wrong could mean downtime and disruption. We've built a domain transfer checklist to help you quickly and safely transfer your domains to Cloudflare.

imageAssetFile.title: A step-by-step guide to transferring domains to Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare offers inexpensive domain name registration and renewal for hundreds of TLDs

features.title: All the way up to 11: Serve Brotli from origin and Introducing Compression Rules
features.description: Today, we're enhancing our support for Brotli compression, enabling end-to-end Brotli compression for web content. Compression plays a vital role in reducing bytes during transfers, ensuring quicker downloads and seamless browsing.

imageAssetFile.title: Serve Brotli from origin and Introducing Compression Rules

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of Brotli vice compressing web content

features.title: Introducing the Cloudflare Radar Internet Quality Page
features.description: The new Performance page on Cloudflare Radar provides both country and network (autonomous system) level insight into Internet connection performance (bandwidth) and quality (latency, jitter) over time based on benchmark test data as well as speed.cloudflare.com test results.

imageAssetFile.title: Introducing the Cloudflare Radar Internet Quality Page

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of Cloudflare Radar

features.title: Speeding up APIs with Ricochet for API Gateway
features.description: Today we're announcing Ricochet for API Gateway, the easiest way for Cloudflare customers to achieve faster API responses through automatic, intelligent API response caching.

imageAssetFile.title: Speeding up APIs with Ricochet for API Gateway

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare API Gateway illustration

features.title: How we scaled and protected Eurovision 2023 voting with Pages and Turnstile
features.description: More than 162 million fans tuned in to the 2023 Eurovision Song Contest, the first year that non-participating countries could also vote. Cloudflare helped scale and protect the voting application based.io, built by once.net using our rapid DNS infrastructure, CDN, Cloudflare Pages and Turnstile.

imageAssetFile.title: How we scaled and protected Eurovision

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a microphone on stage

features.title: Making Cloudflare Pages the fastest way to serve your sites
features.description: Pages is now the fastest way to serve your sites across Netlify, Vercel and many others and we're so proud.

imageAssetFile.altText: Pages performance; how WfP significantly decreased latency
imageAssetFile.title: Pages performance; how WfP significantly decreased latency

features.title: Recapping Speed Week 2023
features.description: Recapping all the announcements made during Speed Week 2023

imageAssetFile.altText: Recapping all the announcements made during Speed Week 2023
imageAssetFile.title: Recapping all the announcements made during Speed Week 2023
